item.description:
Can we get the growler again?

Everyone knows Trinity. Its that really famous brewhouse/pub Downtown. They also have a great trivia night, which will be our stop next Tuesday. Trivia takes place in the lower level.

Come on down as we make another showing.

Saying you aren't any good at trivia is no excuse not to come out. Do you watch TV? Movies? Listen to Music? Eat? Know a little history? Geography?

Every little bit helps and great conversation is guaranteed.

Game starts close to 8:00 and runs for about 2 hours!

Try to get there a little early - about 7:30 - as the place fills up fast.
See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me, should be easy to spot
item.name: Trivia @ Trinity Brewhouse
